meanings.sent1: She misused the computer by pressing all the keys at once.
meanings.sent2: He often misused his tools, causing them to break easily.
meanings.sent3: The robot misused the instructions and started dancing instead of cleaning.
meanings.sent4: Her misused knowledge of magic led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent5: The misused medicine had unintended side effects on the patient.

meanings.definition: Treat (someone or something) badly or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: The bully misused his power to intimidate others.
meanings.sent2: The landlord misused his authority by raising the rent unfairly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat misused the yarn as a toy, unraveling it everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The storm misused the fragile branches, breaking them with its strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The misused trust between friends caused a rift in their relationship.
